name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo): Memes for StuCo-Taking Teens
base_name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo): Memes for StuCo-Taking Teens
long_desc: Have you ever made a meme, posted it to an internet forum, and had it fail miserably Perhaps you have found a hilarious meme on Reddit and wanted to know more about its origins. Join the creator of the CM Memes for Spicy Teens Facebook group and its mod team as we dive deep into the origins of memes, the subcultures created around good content, and the future of Internet inside jokes.
